thread.title: Coca-Cola, PepsiCo Try New Ways to Combat Soda Slump

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Coca-Cola, PepsiCo Try New Ways to Combat Soda Slump

organizations.name: pepsico try new ways to combat soda slump coca-cola co.

text:
Coca-Cola Co., PepsiCo Inc. and Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc. have been remaking themselves for the past decade, adding products like kombucha tea and coconut water as consumers migrate to less sugary drinks.
But the three drink giants, set to report their fourth-quarter earnings this week, have recently embraced different strategies to combat the long slide in soda sales.
